description: After California State University Los Angeles staged protests over CSULA Young Americans for Freedom chapter's decision to host Ben Shapiro for a lecture |
title: Watch Live: ‘When Free Speech Becomes a Problem’ — Ben Shapiro Live Protest from CSULA
title_page: Watch Live: 'When Free Speech Becomes a Problem' --- Ben Shapiro Live Protest from CSULA | Breitbart
text:
After California State University Los Angeles staged protests over CSULA Young Americans for Freedom chapter’s decision to host Ben Shapiro for a lecture sponsored by Young America’s Foundation’s Fred R. Allen Lecture Series titled, “When Diversity Becomes a Problem,” the president of the university canceled the event.
But Ben Shapiro and YAF have every intention of holding it anyway.
This story has made headlines across the national media. The YAF chapter has been targeted and threatened by administrators, professors, and students. The event is expected to draw heavy protests from #BlackLivesMatter activists and other leftist groups.
You can watch all of the action, including expected protests, right here on the live stream on Thursday beginning at 5:00 p.m. EST.
Follow Breitbart.tv on Twitter @BreitbartVideo
